name: GamePaint
description:
NB: (phone users) Turn your phone sideways before you click run game GamePaint - Draw your own platform game

Create a platform game by drawing characters, enemies, items and levels. Tweak the behavior of your objects to create your own type of adventure. Suitable for touch screens.

Colors

To activate more features such as colors and stories, turn on the advanced mode in the main menu. The advanced mode is less stable and experimental so expect bugs and glitches. Once features are stable and easy to use, they will be moved to the simple mode.

Sharing a game

It is possible to share games with other people. To share a link that directly opens a game, add the following at the end of the URL: ?game=URL_TO_GAME_FILE 

Replace URL_TO_GAME_FILE with a direct link to where you have uploaded the game. The link must support direct download.

For example the demo game can be loaded like this:

https://gamepaint.itch.io/gamepaint?game=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreasNaustdal/GamePaint-Demo-Games/master/Demo.json

Known bugs and problems:

On mobile phones, if you load a game, the app will go out of fullscreen. Click restore to continue.

On some devices/browsers the arrow keys doesn't work when playing. Try a different browser. Chrome is recommended.

Closing and reopening games may cause out-of-memory errors. Try refreshing the page instead.

Some bugs are causing lines to appear or disappear. Exporting and loading the game  again may stabilize it.
